content.query:
-- Create the mapping table with HASH distribution
CREATE TABLE Control.FolderTableMap
(
  FolderName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   -- e.g. 'park-data'
  TableName  VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL    -- e.g. 'ParkData'
)
WITH
(
  DISTRIBUTION = HASH(FolderName)
);
GO

-- Add the primary key constraint as NOT ENFORCED
ALTER TABLE Control.FolderTableMap
ADD CONSTRAINT PK_FolderTableMap
  PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (FolderName) NOT ENFORCED;
GO


-- Populate the mapping table with individual INSERTs
INSERT INTO Control.FolderTableMap (FolderName, TableName)  
VALUES ('park-data',     'ParkData');  

INSERT INTO Control.FolderTableMap (FolderName, TableName)  
VALUES ('squirrel-data', 'SquirrelData');  

INSERT INTO Control.FolderTableMap (FolderName, TableName)  
VALUES ('visitor-log',   'VisitorLog');  
GO
